PluginData.FriendlyName: Emissive Colors - Red / Green Color Vision Deficiency
PluginData.Author: enenra
PluginData.Tooltip: Changes the emissive colors of all blocks to allow people with Red / Green Color Vision Deficiencies to better differentiate between them.
PluginData.Description:
This mod changes the emissive colors of all blocks to allow people with Red / Green Color Vision Deficiencies to better differentiate between them.
Features - Green was changed to have more blue, resulting in a teal-adjacent color. - Yellow status indicators were changed to orange. - Orange status indicators were chagned to yellow.
Notes - This was made specifically for w4stedspace and his particular CVD but I felt it might be beneficial for other people as well.
